Package employees

Class HeadKeeper.HdKBuilder

java.lang.Object
employees.HeadKeeper.HdKBuilder
Enclosing class:
HeadKeeper
public static class HeadKeeper.HdKBuilder extends Object
The builder class is nested and static.

Being a static class allows to use its methods without having to create an object.

The class will have setters for each attribute. They will check if the parameter has the correct format or throw an exception

No getters needed for this class

  • Method Details

    • setName

      public HeadKeeper.HdKBuilder setName(String name) throws ValidationException
      Set the name of the Head Keeper.

      the method will check that the name has a correct format, or it will throw a validation exception.

      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Head Keeper
      Returns:
      returns the current HdKBuilder
      Throws:
      ValidationException - Incorrect Name Format

    • setContactNumber

      public HeadKeeper.HdKBuilder setContactNumber(String number)
      Set the tel number of the Head Keeper.

      no validation on the tel to keep simple

      Parameters:
      number - Telephone number of the Head Keeper
      Returns:
      returns the current HdKBuilder

    • HBuilder

      public HeadKeeper HBuilder() throws ValidationException
      This is the Builder method. It will check every attribute of the main class.

      If the name or lastname are empty, it will throw an exception as those are mandatory, otherwise it will assign default values to the missing one.

      Once done, it will return the created HeadKeeper object.

      Returns:
      HeadKeeper object with all the values assigned.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - Exception thrown if the name or lastname was not passed to the Builder.
